        public boolean nearby(int playerX,
                      int playerY,
                      int x,
                      int y)
        Parameters:
        playerX - player's x-coordinate
        playerY - player's y-coordinate
        x - character's x-coordinate
        y - character's y-coordinate
        Returns:
